title: Reporting player behaviour after the game?
body:
Is there any way that one can report a players behaviour when the stat screen is gone? They added me and proceeded to harrass me long after the game was finished.

Proof attached

replies.body:
I've removed the name, I reviewed their behaviour in your game, no further proof needed.

Your report after the game is sufficient, it triggered a 25 game chat restriction for them which was definitely warranted so thanks for remembering to report. If they keep up this behaviour and keep getting reported then they're at a real risk of being permabanned.
You can't name and shame on the boards so you're gonna have to remove the name
